workwithtrees

Class AVLTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • workwithtrees.BinaryTree
      • workwithtrees.AVLTree

  • public class AVLTree
extends BinaryTree
    Class of the AVL Binary Tree. This class inherit the class BinaryTree. He contains the class of the node for a AVL binary tree, which include an additional field as "Balance factor". Balancing can change when adding or removing, and is restored using the small left (right) or large left (right) turns.
    Since:
    1.3
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    DantalioNxxi
    See Also:
    BinaryTree, AVLTree.Node

      • balance

        private int balance(AVLTree.Node x,
                    AVLTree.Node y)
        Is calculate a balance factor for the node with x and y, where x-root-of-the-left-subTree, y-root-of-the-right-subTree. The balance factor lies in the range from -2 to +2, the AVL tree of other factors can not be
        Parameters:
        x - the left sub-tree for the node
        y - the right sub-tree for the node
        Returns:
        + if leftSubTree is higher, - if rightSubTree is higher.

      • add

        public void add(int key,
                int value)
        Adds the node into this BinaryTree. If the node with such key is exist already, then him assign new value v. Uses the method addForRoot.
        Specified by:
        add in class BinaryTree
        Parameters:
        key - key of the added node
        value - value of the added node
        See Also:
        addForRoot(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node, int, int, workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node)

      • addForRoot

        private AVLTree.Node addForRoot(AVLTree.Node node,
                                int key,
                                int value,
                                AVLTree.Node father)
        Add a new node with "key" and "value" for a tree with root "node", which has a parent "father". Uses the methods balance, leftRotation and rightRotation for set of the balancing. Used by the method add (for full three by default).
        Parameters:
        node - root of sub-tree where will be insert a new node
        key - of the new node
        value - of the new node
        father - for the root of sub-tree
        Returns:
        root of the sub-tree which is contain a new node and is balancing.
        See Also:
        add(int, int), balance(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node, workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node), leftRotation(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node), rightRotation(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node)

      • leftRotation

        private AVLTree.Node leftRotation(AVLTree.Node node)
        From right to left rotation. Used by the methods addForRoot and removeForRoot.
        Parameters:
        node - around which will be to do right to left rotation.
        Returns:
        the node which will stay on his place.
        See Also:
        addForRoot(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node, int, int, workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node), removeForRoot(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node, int)

      • rightRotation

        private AVLTree.Node rightRotation(AVLTree.Node node)
        From left to right rotation. Used by the methods addForRoot and removeForRoot.
        Parameters:
        node - around which will be to do left to right rotation.
        Returns:
        the node which will stay on his place.
        See Also:
        addForRoot(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node, int, int, workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node), removeForRoot(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node, int)

      • removeForRoot

        private AVLTree.Node removeForRoot(AVLTree.Node node,
                                   int key)
        For removing node for the subTree with root node"". After the removal, it is necessary to check the balancing index of each of the nodes, and if necessary, balance. Used by the overriding method remove (for full AVLThree by default).
        Parameters:
        node - root of sub-tree where will be removed a node
        key - of the node which will be removed
        Returns:
        the node which will stay on his place (or new root for full tree).
        See Also:
        min(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node), remove(int), leftRotation(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node), rightRotation(workwithtrees.AVLTree.Node)

      • fillPirOnlyKeys

        private void fillPirOnlyKeys(AVLTree.Node node,
                             int level,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.StringBuilder> pyramid)
        Fills the pyramid by only keys of The Binary Tree. Used by the method printOnlyKeys()
        Parameters:
        node - node of the Binary Tree, from which the pyramid will be filled
        level - of the pyramid, from which the method will fill this pyramid
        pyramid - which will be filled by key of the nodes in String type of the Binary Tree
        See Also:
        printOnlyKeys()

      • printOnlyKeys

        public void printOnlyKeys()
        Prints the AVL Tree with only keys in the compressed form of the pyramid. Uses the method fillPirOnlyKeys() java.util.ArrayList)
